00d6a209-6ce7-420d-ae2f-6da2277c4640.description: You add your Charisma bonus to your initiative rolls.
00d6a209-6ce7-420d-ae2f-6da2277c4640.name: Hot Headed

requires.description: CHA vs AC, 1d6 fire damage
requires.name: Firebolt

required_for.description: You have immunity to fire damage.
required_for.name: Coal Walker

01e239b0-1bbf-43df-8ec4-96d3bd17e5b4.description: Whenever there are more allies than enemies adjacent to an enemy creature, that creature has disadvantage on attack rolls.
01e239b0-1bbf-43df-8ec4-96d3bd17e5b4.name: Distracting Flanker

requires.description: For 5 ticks, you may push or pull a target 5 feet.  An unwilling target must succeed on an Athletics roll to avoid the movement.
requires.name: Telekinetic Shove

required_for.description: Whenever you hit with a melee attack, you can use any powers from the Debuff tree as a reaction.
required_for.name: Spellstrike

02292caf-cc30-46fd-8980-0f53ce61e9fb.description: Make an attack roll using Strength against a target within range. If you glance, you can give up other glancing effects to reduce armor style by one.
02292caf-cc30-46fd-8980-0f53ce61e9fb.name: Sundering Strike

required_for.description: You can move and attack on the same turn.  You pay the full tick cost
required_for.name: Charge

02d62c46-a238-4170-9644-6ac3de7662fb.description: You can conjure up an inanimate object in your hand or on the ground in an unoccupied space that you can see within 10 feet of you. This object can be no larger than 3 feet on a side and weigh no more than 10 pounds, and its form must be that of a nonmagical object that you have seen. The object is visibly magical, radiating dim light out to 5 feet.
02d62c46-a238-4170-9644-6ac3de7662fb.name: Minor Conjuration

requires.description: You bind a small spirit to obey your commands.  The spirit lasts for 1 hour, and can be commanded as a 5 tick action.  It cannot attack, but can perform minor actions a human servant would.  It has 1 hit point
requires.name: Unseen Servant

required_for.description: When you finish a long rest, roll 3d6 and record the numbers rolled. You can replace any attack roll, saving throw, or ability check made by you or a creature that you can see with the foretelling rolls. You must choose to do so before the roll.
required_for.name: Portent

required_for.description: You can communicate telepathically with creatures you are aware of that have language and are within 30 feet of you
required_for.name: Telepathy

0a7406c8-a6a4-4535-9705-8da7828dddaf.description: You gain advantage on CHA checks.  Interacting with creatures in this way clearly influences them magically, and they will react as such 1 minute after the interaction
0a7406c8-a6a4-4535-9705-8da7828dddaf.name: Friends

required_for.description: Choose a target that can see or hear you and make a Power roll. On a success, the target is unaware of anything but you.
required_for.name: Entrancing Gaze

0af37d1d-13bb-498f-af6c-1500161d630d.description: INT vs AC, Cold damage.  You can forgo the damage to instead inflict the speed halved injury
0af37d1d-13bb-498f-af6c-1500161d630d.name: Frostbite

required_for.description: You can temporarily alter the physical properties of one nonmagical object, changing it from one substance into another. You perform a special alchemical procedure on one object composed entirely of wood, stone (but not a gemstone), iron, copper, or silver, transforming it into a different one of those materials. For each 10 minutes you spend performing the procedure, you can transform up to 1 cubic foot of material. After 1 hour, or until you lose your concentration (as if you were concentrating on a spell), the material reverts to its original substance.
required_for.name: Minor Alchemy

0f51d0b9-dd4e-4ac5-bf99-0100411346b4.description: STR vs AC.  If you hit the target, you can make an attack as a reaction if it attacks anyone else on its turn, or if it leaves your threat range
0f51d0b9-dd4e-4ac5-bf99-0100411346b4.name: Booming Blade

required_for.description: Whenever a creature adjacent to you takes damage, you can use your reaction to take that damage instead.
required_for.name: Bodyguard

1a911fef-40c6-451a-8a47-8825c6a922cd.description: Allies within 5 feet of you gain advantage on Athletics, Endurance, and Composure checks.
1a911fef-40c6-451a-8a47-8825c6a922cd.name: Aura of Courage

requires.description: If your proficiency in a CHA skill is higher than an Ally's, that Ally gains advantage on that check.
requires.name: Noble Mien

1e2ace35-8e89-4013-99e7-184c40765cfb.description: Whenever a creature with one of your spells on it dies, you can spend a Hit Die.
1e2ace35-8e89-4013-99e7-184c40765cfb.name: Grim Harvest

requires.description: You can temporarily alter the physical properties of one nonmagical object, changing it from one substance into another. You perform a special alchemical procedure on one object composed entirely of wood, stone (but not a gemstone), iron, copper, or silver, transforming it into a different one of those materials. For each 10 minutes you spend performing the procedure, you can transform up to 1 cubic foot of material. After 1 hour, or until you lose your concentration (as if you were concentrating on a spell), the material reverts to its original substance.
requires.name: Minor Alchemy

1e703d65-112e-4e89-94fd-4c6ecf31f28d.description: Your AC is 10 + your Proficiency modifier + your Dexterity bonus.
1e703d65-112e-4e89-94fd-4c6ecf31f28d.name: Earthen Resilience

requires.description: You have advantage on Saving Throws against forced movement.
requires.name: Stable Roots

234d4da4-e194-48ed-a081-0266826cba1b.description: You score critical hits (but do not generate hero points) on rolls of 14 and above.
234d4da4-e194-48ed-a081-0266826cba1b.name: Double Threat Range

25d061ab-90c7-4c9c-b840-148a29382b4e.description: You can silently communicate a single sentence to an ally who you can see and can see you
25d061ab-90c7-4c9c-b840-148a29382b4e.name: Message

required_for.description: If an ally has multiple sources of advantage on an attack roll, they can grant advantage to an ally's next attack, so long as that Ally is visible and within 30 feet.
required_for.name: Pass it On

26693077-6193-489c-a0ba-abb070a3ec26.description: Choose a skill, you double your proficiency bonus for active checks with that skill
26693077-6193-489c-a0ba-abb070a3ec26.name: Skill Expertise

requires.description: Choose a skill - you can take 10 minutes to double your proficiency with active checks in that skill
requires.name: Tool Expertise

2a2673fc-cb15-4cc3-a01d-86c84c3f5f40.description: You can cast spells while polymorphed. You do so with disadvantage.
2a2673fc-cb15-4cc3-a01d-86c84c3f5f40.name: Polymorphic Casting

2f4f7701-f099-4efb-9f0e-f1eeabc929d1.description: Whenever you kill a creature, you can use your reaction to make an Intimidating Presence check.
2f4f7701-f099-4efb-9f0e-f1eeabc929d1.name: Death is Scary

requires.description: Choose a target that can see or hear you and make an Intimidation check. On a success against the target’s Composure defense, the target is afraid of you.
requires.name: Intimidating Presence

30fe146f-0994-4281-ba26-430505359ab4.description: You may have your healing act as temp HP that lasts until the next rest, rather than normal healing.
30fe146f-0994-4281-ba26-430505359ab4.name: Vitality

31b31960-ac88-4f71-8f56-3cc2a63eb1d4.description: You have advantage on Saving Throws against all effects with the mind tag.
31b31960-ac88-4f71-8f56-3cc2a63eb1d4.name: Ice Queen

34004487-468e-4576-b1a9-4487efdc29f9.description: Your movement never provokes attacks of opportunity
34004487-468e-4576-b1a9-4487efdc29f9.name: Always Disengage

3a031fee-9f3e-418b-9834-eaafd753183d.description: WIS vs AC, short range.  You can choose which injury table to roll on, and roll damage as though it was a martial weapon if the target has fewer than full hit points.
3a031fee-9f3e-418b-9834-eaafd753183d.name: Toll the Dead

3b095b3a-2ec4-48f8-8e71-a4564a611bca.description: Make a Dexterity roll. On a success against the Wisdom defenses of everyone within 30 feet, everyone’s attention is drawn to a point you choose within range.
3b095b3a-2ec4-48f8-8e71-a4564a611bca.name: Distracting Trick

required_for.description: You can hide as a 5 tick action instead of a 10 tick action
required_for.name: Vanish

requires.description: If you attack with a martial melee weapon on a slow attack, add the dice together instead of taking the highest one.
requires.name: Strength of Mountains

3dfd5779-923a-4dc9-9912-9aea32b657f8.description: Your arcane ward is not vulnerable to an element of your choice
3dfd5779-923a-4dc9-9912-9aea32b657f8.name: Elemental Attunement

requires.description: At the beginning of a long rest, and whenever you successfully cast an Abjuration spell, you gain an Arcane Ward. The ward has HP equal to your proficiency bonus, vulnerability to all damage, and you can use your reaction to interpose it against any attack within 30 feet.
requires.name: Arcane Ward

42523f95-09a7-4039-8368-f55aaa95cb45.description: So long as you don't move on your turn, you can use a bonus action to gain advantage on an attack against a creature you attacked last round.
42523f95-09a7-4039-8368-f55aaa95cb45.name: Take Aim

requires.description: Choose a creature within 30 feet. You get +1d6 to damage rolls against it.  Only one creature can have your mark on it at a time.
requires.name: Hunter’s Mark

required_for.description: You can make a ranged attack with disadvantage.  If you hit, it is a critical hit.
required_for.name: Sharp Shooting

49b6a53d-8bab-44ef-af03-1a777bb438ea.description: Choose a target that can see or hear you and make a Power roll. On a success, the target is unaware of anything but you.
49b6a53d-8bab-44ef-af03-1a777bb438ea.name: Entrancing Gaze

requires.description: You gain advantage on CHA checks.  Interacting with creatures in this way clearly influences them magically, and they will react as such 1 minute after the interaction
requires.name: Friends

4c1ba646-12f2-4cd5-b2e4-3f1e1cde1580.description: Choose a creature within 30 feet. You get +1d6 to damage rolls against it.  Only one creature can have your mark on it at a time.
4c1ba646-12f2-4cd5-b2e4-3f1e1cde1580.name: Hunter’s Mark

required_for.description: So long as you don't move on your turn, you can use a bonus action to gain advantage on an attack against a creature you attacked last round.
required_for.name: Take Aim

548fae7f-9ae8-42ad-ad79-595112879513.description: 10 ticks - your next glancing attack against the target is considered a normal hit
548fae7f-9ae8-42ad-ad79-595112879513.name: True Strike

required_for.description: If no allies are adjacent to or attacking an enemy, you have advantage on melee attacks against that enemy.
required_for.name: Dueling

5512e032-e549-47d5-9394-11853b2c0771.description: You can hide as a 5 tick action instead of a 10 tick action
5512e032-e549-47d5-9394-11853b2c0771.name: Vanish

requires.description: Make a Dexterity roll. On a success against the Wisdom defenses of everyone within 30 feet, everyone’s attention is drawn to a point you choose within range.
requires.name: Distracting Trick

5b9e9c1f-2284-46ed-9e74-61557111995d.description: You can make medicine checks to stabilize creatures as a 5 tick action
5b9e9c1f-2284-46ed-9e74-61557111995d.name: Spare the Dying

required_for.description: You may attempt a DC 18 Medicine check. If you succeed, a target you touch can expend two HD to gain the benefit of healing (i.e. they only heal a number of HP equal to 1 roll of their hit die).
required_for.name: Battlefield Medicine

5d121e59-53f9-4bc1-be39-126a9a2c681d.description: When you drop to 0 HP or gain the "Death" injury, you do not fall unconscious, though you still make death saving throws.  All your actions have disadvantage, and all actions against you have advantage.
5d121e59-53f9-4bc1-be39-126a9a2c681d.name: Too Stupid to Die

requires.description: Whenever an effect would allow you to spend a Hit Die, you can instead spend 1d4 instead of 2d4.
requires.name: Hit Die Splitting

required_for.description: You have advantage on Saving Throws against forced movement.
required_for.name: Stable Roots

required_for.description: You add your Charisma bonus to your initiative rolls.
required_for.name: Hot Headed

60cae960-0810-4da9-891c-9170ca4a943f.description: You can communicate telepathically with creatures you are aware of that have language and are within 30 feet of you
60cae960-0810-4da9-891c-9170ca4a943f.name: Telepathy

requires.description: CHA vs AC, Mind Damage
requires.name: Vicious Mockery

required_for.description: You may spend a hit die to impose disadvantage on an attack, Power roll, or skill check. If the action fails, the target takes damage equal to a roll of the hit die you spent.
required_for.name: Bardic Doubts

6123a606-9119-49a1-b16f-f4249c79b2d2.description: If an ally has multiple sources of advantage on an attack roll, they can grant advantage to an ally's next attack, so long as that Ally is visible and within 30 feet.
6123a606-9119-49a1-b16f-f4249c79b2d2.name: Pass it On

requires.description: You can silently communicate a single sentence to an ally who you can see and can see you
requires.name: Message

648423cf-92d7-403e-ab32-a8913224359a.description: You can make multiple attacks simultaneously, spending ticks for each.  Each attack has disadvantage.
648423cf-92d7-403e-ab32-a8913224359a.name: Empty the Clip

requires.description: You can make opportunity attacks with your weapon, if it's loaded, other than attacks provoked by movement.
requires.name: Crack Shot

648d5534-a684-404b-bf53-de051197f2a0.description: If you have cover, you can give up that cover until your next turn to gain advantage on your next attack roll.
648d5534-a684-404b-bf53-de051197f2a0.name: Brace

requires.description: You can load your weapon with a special shot for 6 ticks.  If you do, your next attack targets Acrobatics, and hits everyone in a cone.  It only rolls for injury, and doesn't deal damage.
requires.name: Buckshot

65b5bb18-8a06-4315-9325-10aee6a55000.description: Wearing heavy armor does not reduce your move speed.
65b5bb18-8a06-4315-9325-10aee6a55000.name: Comfortable Plates

68fe9120-ac84-4b76-ac89-23cabd58c2de.description: Choose a skill - you can take 10 minutes to double your proficiency with active checks in that skill
68fe9120-ac84-4b76-ac89-23cabd58c2de.name: Tool Expertise

requires.description: You gain the ability to manipulate objects at range, acting quickly and quietly.  You can only manipulate objects that weigh 5 pounds or less and are within 30 feet.  You have disadvantage on Sleight-of-Hand checks at range
requires.name: Mage Hand

required_for.description: Choose a skill, you double your proficiency bonus for active checks with that skill
required_for.name: Skill Expertise

69aec6f3-6246-48a4-a1e6-24aa6cbec5ae.description: WIS vs Composure, target is calmed and won't attack until you or an ally takes a hostile action.
69aec6f3-6246-48a4-a1e6-24aa6cbec5ae.name: Touch of Calm

6b484d06-7af3-4598-9999-3a55e8405bdf.description: You gain the ability to manipulate objects at range, acting quickly and quietly.  You can only manipulate objects that weigh 5 pounds or less and are within 30 feet.  You have disadvantage on Sleight-of-Hand checks at range
6b484d06-7af3-4598-9999-3a55e8405bdf.name: Mage Hand

required_for.description: Choose a skill - you can take 10 minutes to double your proficiency with active checks in that skill
required_for.name: Tool Expertise

6d34d5b5-47d1-482c-be49-26202f496864.description: You have immunity to fire damage.
6d34d5b5-47d1-482c-be49-26202f496864.name: Coal Walker

requires.description: You add your Charisma bonus to your initiative rolls.
requires.name: Hot Headed

70ccbf65-b50d-45b8-bf31-4af1a4aa6e90.description: As Guidance, but you generate a DM point.
70ccbf65-b50d-45b8-bf31-4af1a4aa6e90.name: Twist Fate

728cc85d-7123-4f0f-816b-7a013641d7f7.description: If your proficiency in a CHA skill is higher than an Ally's, that Ally gains advantage on that check.
728cc85d-7123-4f0f-816b-7a013641d7f7.name: Noble Mien

74d53b53-ad3f-4699-a38b-9de91ef9cb9e.description: If no allies are adjacent to or attacking an enemy, you have advantage on melee attacks against that enemy.
74d53b53-ad3f-4699-a38b-9de91ef9cb9e.name: Dueling

requires.description: 10 ticks - your next glancing attack against the target is considered a normal hit
requires.name: True Strike

774b0a4b-6416-499d-be4e-e940ab98c90b.description: You create a sound or image that can fill a five-foot cube, that is as loud as a lions roar or as quiet as a whisper.  It lasts up to 1 minute
774b0a4b-6416-499d-be4e-e940ab98c90b.name: Minor Illusion

77615d38-b802-41f4-84ff-e3e32d3722c6.description: Choose a target that can see or hear you and make an Intimidation check. On a success against the target’s Composure defense, the target is afraid of you.
77615d38-b802-41f4-84ff-e3e32d3722c6.name: Intimidating Presence

required_for.description: Whenever you kill a creature, you can use your reaction to make an Intimidating Presence check.
required_for.name: Death is Scary

79ee8b08-3cc4-4b43-bd5a-d79cf709d84f.name: Unseen Servant

required_for.description: You can conjure up an inanimate object in your hand or on the ground in an unoccupied space that you can see within 10 feet of you. This object can be no larger than 3 feet on a side and weigh no more than 10 pounds, and its form must be that of a nonmagical object that you have seen. The object is visibly magical, radiating dim light out to 5 feet.
required_for.name: Minor Conjuration

7d875853-fd55-4cc3-8da8-1a6f0a4183e0.description: Whenever an attack misses you, you can move 5 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.
7d875853-fd55-4cc3-8da8-1a6f0a4183e0.name: Quick Feet

7d90e0bb-5816-4ea0-a174-8c6a4da7fa35.description: If you attack with a martial melee weapon on a slow attack, add the dice together instead of taking the highest one.

8059034d-6ae0-46c2-befc-b241fa48b5a5.description: When you are hit by an attack, you can attempt a Power check as a reaction to force the target to reroll. The DC is the attack result. This counts as casting a spell for your spells per rest.
8059034d-6ae0-46c2-befc-b241fa48b5a5.name: Arcane Deflection

84f30bbf-22d4-45b6-9972-22074b972563.description: Whenever you take a move action, you move as though you had spent 2 more ticks.
84f30bbf-22d4-45b6-9972-22074b972563.name: Step of the Wild

86203e2f-c628-444b-9739-e39f98757b2e.description: You can load your weapon with a special shot for 6 ticks.  If you do, your next attack targets Acrobatics, and hits everyone in a cone.  It only rolls for injury, and doesn't deal damage.
86203e2f-c628-444b-9739-e39f98757b2e.name: Buckshot

required_for.description: If you have cover, you can give up that cover until your next turn to gain advantage on your next attack roll.
required_for.name: Brace

862cbca0-48e4-4421-9990-42724e939939.description: You can make opportunity attacks with your weapon, if it's loaded, other than attacks provoked by movement.
862cbca0-48e4-4421-9990-42724e939939.name: Crack Shot

requires.description: You can attempt to fire while empty.  If your attack roll is below 15+number of powers you've used, your weapon jams and can't be used for the rest of combat.  Using this ability counts as a power.
requires.name: Miscount

required_for.description: You can make multiple attacks simultaneously, spending ticks for each.  Each attack has disadvantage.
required_for.name: Empty the Clip

86c386f6-1785-40da-b7fa-2d189f203c7e.description: You can attempt to fire while empty.  If your attack roll is below 15+number of powers you've used, your weapon jams and can't be used for the rest of combat.  Using this ability counts as a power.

873a5bc6-7f03-4d03-a8d5-aeb6ffe08b48.description: You can spend your hit dice to heal others.
873a5bc6-7f03-4d03-a8d5-aeb6ffe08b48.name: Lay on Hands

requires.description: You may attempt a DC 18 Medicine check. If you succeed, a target you touch can expend two HD to gain the benefit of healing (i.e. they only heal a number of HP equal to 1 roll of their hit die).

required_for.name: Arcane Ward

91edc319-e10a-454f-a719-5aa6542be6b5.name: Barbaric Yawp

9a44447c-0735-46a9-8c28-cd1c771045fe.description: You gain an unarmed attack that counts as martial for damage purposes, and access to the bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing trees
9a44447c-0735-46a9-8c28-cd1c771045fe.name: Primal Savagery

9adfb447-3f99-4c55-923a-d0829ec9148c.description: You can attack each creature adjacent to you.  If you do, you only roll for injury, and inflict no damage.  This attack cannot glance
9adfb447-3f99-4c55-923a-d0829ec9148c.name: Sword Burst

9ca3b427-19b5-4862-849d-ac1de2e8cf62.description: Creatures you are aware of have disadvantage on INT saves to pierce your illusions.
9ca3b427-19b5-4862-849d-ac1de2e8cf62.name: Reflexive Illusion

a02c90b0-0e49-4088-b2ba-1642314cd665.description: For 5 ticks, you imbue a number of pieces of ammunition equal to your proficiency modifier with natural energy.  Until the end of combat, attacks with the ammunition roll an additional d6 and take the highest result
a02c90b0-0e49-4088-b2ba-1642314cd665.name: Magic Stone

a0ec9600-33b8-4fa0-8e64-3e0ef6755640.description: Whenever you hit with a melee attack, you can use any powers from the Debuff tree as a reaction.
a0ec9600-33b8-4fa0-8e64-3e0ef6755640.name: Spellstrike

requires.description: Whenever there are more allies than enemies adjacent to an enemy creature, that creature has disadvantage on attack rolls.
requires.name: Distracting Flanker

a192237f-908a-46c7-9ffc-fbe472016eed.description: Whenever a creature adjacent to you takes damage, you can use your reaction to take that damage instead.
a192237f-908a-46c7-9ffc-fbe472016eed.name: Bodyguard

requires.description: STR vs AC.  If you hit the target, you can make an attack as a reaction if it attacks anyone else on its turn, or if it leaves your threat range
requires.name: Booming Blade

requires.description: When you drop to 0 HP or gain the "Death" injury, you do not fall unconscious, though you still make death saving throws.  All your actions have disadvantage, and all actions against you have advantage.
requires.name: Too Stupid to Die

af8ba232-7aaa-42b3-b8f0-2eb00fc8345f.description: You can make a ranged attack with disadvantage.  If you hit, it is a critical hit.
af8ba232-7aaa-42b3-b8f0-2eb00fc8345f.name: Sharp Shooting

requires.description: So long as you don't move on your turn, you can use a bonus action to gain advantage on an attack against a creature you attacked last round.
requires.name: Take Aim

b0aa559a-4e6d-4c9d-87ad-0c747077c468.description: Whenever an effect would allow you to spend a Hit Die, you can instead spend 1d4 instead of 2d4.
b0aa559a-4e6d-4c9d-87ad-0c747077c468.name: Hit Die Splitting

required_for.description: When you drop to 0 HP or gain the "Death" injury, you do not fall unconscious, though you still make death saving throws.  All your actions have disadvantage, and all actions against you have advantage.
required_for.name: Too Stupid to Die

b1561a37-94f8-4815-be3f-7a369a5dd623.description: You can move and attack on the same turn.  You pay the full tick cost
b1561a37-94f8-4815-be3f-7a369a5dd623.name: Charge

requires.description: Make an attack roll using Strength against a target within range. If you glance, you can give up other glancing effects to reduce armor style by one.
requires.name: Sundering Strike

required_for.description: If you attack with a martial melee weapon on a slow attack, add the dice together instead of taking the highest one.
required_for.name: Strength of Mountains

b8ce4e3b-00f9-419a-9620-2299745b9f49.description: You may attempt a DC 18 Medicine check. If you succeed, a target you touch can expend two HD to gain the benefit of healing (i.e. they only heal a number of HP equal to 1 roll of their hit die).
b8ce4e3b-00f9-419a-9620-2299745b9f49.name: Battlefield Medicine

requires.description: You can make medicine checks to stabilize creatures as a 5 tick action
requires.name: Spare the Dying

required_for.description: You can spend your hit dice to heal others.
required_for.name: Lay on Hands

c0202238-63fa-4027-a2a8-d96d9c34ddc9.description: You ignore difficult terrain from the plant, earth, and ice tags.
c0202238-63fa-4027-a2a8-d96d9c34ddc9.name: Woodland Stride

c6a3f09d-caeb-4544-8997-5a7151632ad2.description: For 5 ticks, you may push or pull a target 5 feet.  An unwilling target must succeed on an Athletics roll to avoid the movement.
c6a3f09d-caeb-4544-8997-5a7151632ad2.name: Telekinetic Shove

required_for.description: Whenever there are more allies than enemies adjacent to an enemy creature, that creature has disadvantage on attack rolls.
required_for.name: Distracting Flanker

c7e8a4da-0388-4175-a90a-e6fee263762a.description: You have advantage on Concentration saves when in a form other than your natural form.
c7e8a4da-0388-4175-a90a-e6fee263762a.name: Sustained Concentration

c7f4216d-0d41-4258-892d-65f84b7875db.description: When you finish a long rest, roll 3d6 and record the numbers rolled. You can replace any attack roll, saving throw, or ability check made by you or a creature that you can see with the foretelling rolls. You must choose to do so before the roll.
c7f4216d-0d41-4258-892d-65f84b7875db.name: Portent

requires.description: You can conjure up an inanimate object in your hand or on the ground in an unoccupied space that you can see within 10 feet of you. This object can be no larger than 3 feet on a side and weigh no more than 10 pounds, and its form must be that of a nonmagical object that you have seen. The object is visibly magical, radiating dim light out to 5 feet.
requires.name: Minor Conjuration

ca559727-c355-4729-922f-cab8a87feb82.description: All movement provokes attacks of opportunity from you.
ca559727-c355-4729-922f-cab8a87feb82.name: Quick Blade

ca89479c-f8ab-4c24-a734-22d9d90b76a6.description: You may spend a hit die to impose disadvantage on an attack, Power roll, or skill check. If the action fails, the target takes damage equal to a roll of the hit die you spent.
ca89479c-f8ab-4c24-a734-22d9d90b76a6.name: Bardic Doubts

requires.description: You can communicate telepathically with creatures you are aware of that have language and are within 30 feet of you
requires.name: Telepathy
